actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOT, OMB.

official_title: A bill to release the city of Gadsden, Alabama, from all the terms, conditions, reservations, and restrictions contained in a certain deed with respect to certain real property which was previously transferred by such deed as surplus property to the city for airport purposes.

summary.text: Releases the city of Gadsden, Alabama, from specified terms of a deed under which the United States conveyed real property to the city for airport purposes.

titles.title: A bill to release the city of Gadsden, Alabama, from all the terms, conditions, reservations, and restrictions contained in a certain deed with respect to certain real property which was previously transferred by such deed as surplus property to the city for airport purposes.
